statements: SELECT * FROM game_updates WHERE update_id = 1;
SELECT update_id, game_title FROM game_updates WHERE game_title = 'Super Mario';
SELECT update_description FROM game_updates WHERE update_version > 1.5;
SELECT * FROM game_updates ORDER BY game_title DESC;
SELECT game_title, update_version FROM game_updates WHERE game_title LIKE '%Zelda%';
SELECT * FROM game_updates WHERE update_version > 1.0 ORDER BY game_title ASC
SELECT game_title, update_version FROM game_updates WHERE update_description LIKE '%bug%' ORDER BY update_version DESC
SELECT * FROM game_updates WHERE game_title = 'Fortnite' OR game_title = 'Minecraft' ORDER BY update_id ASC
SELECT DISTINCT game_title FROM game_updates ORDER BY game_title
SELECT update_id, game_title, update_version FROM game_updates WHERE game_title LIKE '%Battle%' ORDER BY update_id DESC
SELECT * FROM game_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, version_number, update_description FROM game_updates WHERE version_number > 10;
SELECT patch_number, patch_date, patch_description FROM game_patches ORDER BY patch_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, patch_number, patch_description FROM game_patches WHERE id = 2;
SELECT version_number, update_date FROM game_updates WHERE update_description LIKE '%bug%' ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM game_updates WHERE version_number > 10;
SELECT id, update_description, update_date FROM game_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT patch_number, patch_description FROM game_patches WHERE patch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patch_number, patch_description, patch_date FROM game_patches ORDER BY patch_number ASC, patch_date DESC;
SELECT id, version_number, update_description, update_date FROM game_updates INNER JOIN game_patches ON game_updates.version_number = game_patches.patch_number;
SELECT * FROM game_updates;
SELECT id, version_number FROM game_updates WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM game_updates ORDER BY version_number DESC;
SELECT update_description FROM game_updates WHERE id = 3;
SELECT game_id, patch_description FROM patches WHERE patch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM game_updates WHERE release_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT id, version_number FROM game_updates WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM patches ORDER BY patch_date DESC, patch_id ASC;
SELECT game_id, COUNT(*) AS total_patches FROM patches GROUP BY game_id HAVING total_patches > 5;
SELECT g.id, g.version_number, p.patch_date FROM game_updates g INNER JOIN patches p ON g.id = p.game_id WHERE p.patch_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT * FROM game_updates;
SELECT update_version,update_date FROM game_updates WHERE update_version='1.0';
SELECT * FROM patches WHERE patch_version='1.2' OR patch_version='2.0';
SELECT update_description FROM game_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compatibility WHERE supported_game_id='58591e0b-5ccb-46f1-81d5-4eb9b194c0fc';
SELECT * FROM game_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT update_version, update_date FROM game_updates WHERE update_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT compatibility_id, compatible_version, supported_game_id FROM compatibility WHERE supported_patch_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM history WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patch_version, patch_date, COUNT(*) FROM patches GROUP BY patch_version, patch_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM game_patches ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT patch_version, update_description FROM game_patches WHERE patch_version > 10;
SELECT release_date, update_description FROM game_patches WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT update_id, update_details -> 'version' AS version_number FROM game_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT game_id, supported_versions FROM compatibility_info WHERE patch_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM game_patches ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT patch_version, update_description FROM game_patches WHERE patch_version > 10;
SELECT * FROM compatibility_info WHERE supported_versions->>'platform' = 'Windows' ORDER BY patch_id ASC;
SELECT update_id, update_date FROM game_updates INNER JOIN game_patches ON game_updates.id = game_patches.id WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_id, MAX(patch_id) AS latest_patch FROM compatibility_info GROUP BY game_id;
